headline: Union Pacific Corporation Declares Second Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: OMAHA, Neb., May 08, 2025--The Board of Directors of Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.34 per share on the company’s common stock, payable June 30, 2025, to shareholders of record May 30, 2025.

headline: 3 Magnificent Dividend Stocks Down 19% to 48% I'm Buying Right Now for My Daughter's Portfolio
summary: While I don't expect my daughter to become a stock-picking fanatic like me, I've enjoyed building a portfolio with her that is full of simple(ish) businesses that any elementary-aged kid might appreciate.  With tariff turbulence helping Union Pacific's price to tumble 22% from its highs, now looks like the perfect time to buy the steady stock.
